title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Stabilizing relationship dynamics is possible if you can iron out the petty differences between you and a partner or close ally today. It might seem as if you need to explore every little nuance before emotions explode. Expressions of jealousy or disloyalty can surge forward to the surprise of everyone involved. Chances are a small grievance is magnified, so dont let the prideful Leo Moon in your 7th House of Others loop you into stewing over your mutual gripes. Lose the self-pity and gain a friend. Author Mark Twain penned, "Forgiveness is the fragrance the violet sheds on the heel that has crushed it." Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
